name: Samurai Jack (Season 5)
summary: It's been 50 years since we saw Samurai Jack and time has not been kind to him. Aku has destroyed every time portal and Jack has stopped aging, a side effect of time travel. It seems he is cursed to just roam the land for all eternity. His past haunts him as well as a cult of assassins dedicated to killing him for Aku's glory. (via iTunes)

eps.name: XCII
eps.desc: After 50 long years of battling Aku, Samurai Jack has started to slip into madness and finds that his psyche has now become his own worst enemy. (via iTunes)

eps.name: XCIII
eps.desc: Jack's will to survive is pushed to its absolute limits after a deadly, unseen foe launches a relentless surprise attack. (via iTunes)

eps.name: XCIV
eps.desc: A gravely injured Samurai Jack chooses to create his own fate by going up against the deadliest foes he's ever faced, Assassins from the Cult of Aku. (via iTunes)

eps.name: XCV
eps.desc: Samurai Jack must work with a deadly assassin bent on his destruction in order to escape the strange, otherworldly insides of a gargantuan creature that has swallowed them whole. (via iTunes)
